mapper.sql: COURIER_NUMBER, LARGE_AREA, SLICE_AREA, FENBU, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_NAME, SEND_TIME, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, SHOP_NUMBER, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, TIME_OUT, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS_COST, GOODS, ORDER_NUMBER, GOODS_STATE, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SOURCE_ZM
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SOURCE_ZM (COURIER_NUMBER, LARGE_AREA, SLICE_AREA, FENBU, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_NAME, SEND_TIME, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, SHOP_NUMBER, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, TIME_OUT, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS_COST, GOODS, ORDER_NUMBER, GOODS_STATE, CREATE_TIME) values (#{courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{largeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sliceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fenbu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update SOURCE_ZM
COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LARGE_AREA = #{record.largeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SLICE_AREA = #{record.sliceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
